Normal activity, such as moving and attacking, doesn’t interfere with Concentration. The following factors can break concentration: Casting another spell that requires Concentration. You lose Concentration on a spell if you cast another spell that requires Concentration. You can’t concentrate on two Spells at once. Taking damage.
